Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Repeals certain provisions of law relating to the use of certain body imaging scanning equipment at local correctional facilities
Summary: Relates to the use of certain body imaging scanning equipment at local correctional facilities.
LawCode: Rpld ยง3502 sub 6, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal subdivision 6 of section 3502 of the public health law relating to the use of certain body imaging scanning equipment at local correctional facilities
